00041 class ValueMapTraslator : public edm::EDProducer {
00042   typedef double value_t;
00043   typedef edm::ValueMap<value_t> Map_t;
00044 
00045    public:
00046       explicit ValueMapTraslator(const edm::ParameterSet&);
00047       ~ValueMapTraslator();
00048 
00049       static void fillDescriptions(edm::ConfigurationDescriptions& descriptions);
00050 
00051    private:
00052       virtual void beginJob() ;
00053       virtual void produce(edm::Event&, const edm::EventSetup&);
00054       virtual void endJob() ;
00055       
00056       virtual void beginRun(edm::Run&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00057       virtual void endRun(edm::Run&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00058       virtual void beginLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00059       virtual void endLuminosityBlock(edm::LuminosityBlock&, edm::EventSetup const&);
00060 
00061       // ----------member data ---------------------------
00062   edm::InputTag referenceCollectionTAG,oldreferenceCollectionTAG;
00063   edm::InputTag inputCollectionTAG;
00064   std::string outputCollectionName;
00065   edm::Handle<reco::GsfElectronCollection> referenceHandle,oldreferenceHandle;
00066   edm::Handle<Map_t> inputHandle;
00067 };

00081 ValueMapTraslator::ValueMapTraslator(const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig):
00082   referenceCollectionTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("referenceCollection")),
00083   oldreferenceCollectionTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("oldreferenceCollection")),
00084   inputCollectionTAG(iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("inputCollection")),
00085   outputCollectionName(iConfig.getParameter<std::string>("outputCollection"))
00086 {
00087    //now do what ever other initialization is needed
00089   produces< Map_t >(outputCollectionName);
00090   
00091 }

00107 // ------------ method called to produce the data  ------------
00108 void
00109 ValueMapTraslator::produce(edm::Event& iEvent, const edm::EventSetup& iSetup)
00110 {
00111    using namespace edm;
00112    std::vector<value_t>  valueVector;
00113    std::auto_ptr<Map_t> valueVectorPtr(new Map_t());
00114 
00115    //------------------------------ 
00116    iEvent.getByLabel(referenceCollectionTAG, referenceHandle);
00117    iEvent.getByLabel(oldreferenceCollectionTAG, oldreferenceHandle);
00118    iEvent.getByLabel(inputCollectionTAG, inputHandle);
00119 
00120    for(Map_t::const_iterator valueMap_itr = inputHandle->begin();
00121        valueMap_itr != inputHandle->end();
00122        valueMap_itr++){
00123      for(unsigned int i = 0; i < valueMap_itr.size(); i++){
00124 #ifdef DEBUG
00125        std::cout << valueMap_itr[i] << std::endl;
00126 #endif
00127        //       valueVector.push_back((valueMap_itr[i])); //valueMap_itr-inputHandle->begin()]));
00128      }
00129      break;
00130    }
00131 
00132 #ifdef DEBUG   
00133    std::cout << "Size: " << referenceHandle->size() << "\t" << oldreferenceHandle->size() << "\t" << inputHandle->size() << "\t" << valueVector.size() << std::endl;
00134 #endif
00135    for(reco::GsfElectronCollection::const_iterator electronNew = referenceHandle->begin();
00136        electronNew!= referenceHandle->end();
00137        electronNew++){
00138     
00139      for(reco::GsfElectronCollection::const_iterator electron = oldreferenceHandle->begin();
00140          electron!= oldreferenceHandle->end();
00141          electron++){
00142        //if(electronNew->GsfTrackF
00143        if(fabs(electronNew->eta() - electron->eta())>0.0001) continue;
00144        if(fabs(electronNew->phi() - electron->phi())>0.0001) continue;
00145            
00146        reco::GsfElectronRef eleRef(oldreferenceHandle, electron-oldreferenceHandle->begin());
00147        reco::GsfElectronRef eleRef2(referenceHandle, electronNew-referenceHandle->begin());
00148 
00149 #ifdef DEBUG     
00150        std::cout << eleRef->eta() << "\t" << eleRef2->eta() << "\t" 
00151                  << eleRef->energy() << "\t" << eleRef2->energy() << "\t" 
00152                  << (eleRef == eleRef2) << "\t" 
00153                  <<  (*inputHandle)[eleRef] << std::endl;
00154 #endif
00155      valueVector.push_back((*inputHandle)[eleRef]); //valueMap_itr-inputHandle->begin()]));
00156      }
00157    }
00158    //#endif
00159    Map_t::Filler filler(*valueVectorPtr);
00160    filler.insert(referenceHandle, valueVector.begin(), valueVector.end());
00161    filler.fill();
00162 
00163    iEvent.put(valueVectorPtr);
00164    
00165 }
